num_months.description: Number of months used in ground heat exchanger sizing.

timestep.description:
Simulation timestep used in ground heat exchanger sizing.

Options include 'HYBRID', 'HOURLY', 'HOURLYNOLOADAGG'.

'HYBRID' is the default choice due to its faster processing. 

 However, the option 'HOURLY' enables hourly simulation with load aggregation algorithm

when more accuracy in simulation is required.
